long_description: The REI Revelcloud men's jacket stuffs easily into your backpack and provides lightweight warmth during cold, dry days on the trail, or layer it under a shell on rainy days for ultimate protection. Water- and wind-resistant Revelcloud offers breathability and warmth without weighing you down. Pertex(TM) Quantum recycled fabric and a soft lining create an incredibly lightweight, durable and packable jacket; contrast-color lining looks sharp. PrimaLoft(R) Eco synthetic microfiber insulation works a lot like down with low bulk and excellent packability, yet provides warmth even when wet. Revelcloud blocks winds up to 50 mph and the Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers, snow and stains. Full-length front zipper features an internal draft flap; chin guard protects skin from zipper abrasion. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams, enhancing range of motion and comfort under pack straps. Internal hem drawcord seals in warmth; cuffs are trimmed with stretch binding. 2 zip handwarmer pockets and zip chest pocket with media port. REI Revelcloud jacket packs into its own interior lumbar pocket; use it for an emergency pillow. Active fit ensures freedom of motion.
short_description: The REI Revelcloud men's jacket stuffs easily into your backpack and provides lightweight warmth during cold, dry days on the trail, or layer it under a shell on rainy days for ultimate protection.
